name: Snake Classic Retro Nokia Game
description:
Snake Game - Classic Retro Nokia is a free game inspired by the old '97 Nokia classic snake games. Download free and play this amazing game and remember what it was like to play games on old phones!

The game works great on any phones or tablet device. If you like retro style snake games, download this game and compete on the ranks with players from all over the world. Download it right now and have fun in this amazing game!

FEATURES:

🐍 Easy to play
🐍 Optimized for all phones and tablets.
🐍 Player Rank (Android Version).
🐍 Achievements (Android Version).
🐍 6 Maps
🐍 10 Velocity
🐍 And much more!
